words.meaning: opening / calling spirits
welcome to the ceremony
I am pleased and all is well
spirits now I call to heal you
men and women all will heal
I am pleased to be with you here
in my visions I'm with you
welcome / calling spirits / ancestors
welcome family from afar
now the spirits welcome you
I call you to this healing place
I call the spirits to heal you
with this prayer I will heal you
listen to this healing prayer
my ancestors heal the sick
I call my sickly family
spirits of the plants shall come
they will dance among us now
with their joyous dance they heal
to you all I give this prayer

page_description: Page 12 of Ayahuasca Foundation course materials containing two icaros (healing songs): 01. Mato Jowe (Opening/calling spirits) and 02. Nocon Shawan (Welcome/calling spirits/ancestors). Each icaro includes Shipibo-Konibo lyrics with English translations and notation of repetition counts (2x, 3x). Right margin contains handwritten phonetic notes and pronunciation guides.
